abstracts.cdata!:
The Electricity Privatization Adjustment
            Loan will support the government's electricity
            privatization program and related legal/regulatory and
            institutional reforms. The program is designed to promote
            adequate and environmentally sustainable electricity
            supplies and to enhance economic efficiency through
            competition and private sector involvement. The reform
            program to be supported by the loan includes four
            components: (a) maintenance of a satisfactory macroeconomic
            program and financing plan; (b) implementation of legal,
            regulatory, and institutional reforms in the electricity
            sector to promote competition and facilitate privatization;
            (c) application of electricity pricing based on economic
            costs; and (d) privatization of the electricity sector.
